comment.author: 22948027@N02
comment._content: Text in Norwegian, first picture: 'Eftersyn av "Cape Saunders" fyr" - Maintenance of the lighthouse at Cape Saunders Second picture: 'Indlöpet til Strömnæs Bay - set fra "Cape Saunders" fyr' - The entrance to Stromnes Bay seen from the Cape Saunders lighthouse. Third: 'Utsigt fra Cape Saunders fyr mot S. Indlöpet til Husvik Hr med Tönsberg ... ... til höyre paa biledet' - View from Cape Saunders lighthouse. The inlet to Husvik harbour ... ... to the right on the picture. Two words are not possible for me to read, noted by "..." Fourth: 'Transportskibene "... + ..." paa havnen 1912' - The transport ships ... and ... in the harbour 1912.
